-------------------------------------------------------


Creative Agency is a web design portfolio for agencies. We designed this with the business needs of today's agencies in mind. The design is also equipped with responsiveness to make it easier for customers to view the agency's portfolio from any device.


Designs are available in 3 formats, in Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD. So this will make it very easy for you when you want to make changes to the application. The design is also equipped with a grid system and styleguide for consistency, and of course it will be very easy for you if you want to make some changes.


In addition, it has also been designed with all auto layouts, and organized layers. It is very easy for you when you want to make changes just by drag and drop.


The design is available in my:

UI8 | Gumroad


Features:

- Desktop, Tablet, & Mobile Version

- Compatibility: Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD

- Light Mode & Dark Mode

- Components & Styleguide Included

- Well Organised Layers

- 25+ Modern UI Screens

- Full Auto Layout

- Unique, Stylish & Modern Design

- Fully Customizable

- Using Google Free Fonts

- Easy to Change Photos, Fonts, Shape, Color Background


Compatibility:

- Figma

- Sketch

- Adobe XD


Be sure to check out the preview and let us know your thoughts in the comments section below.
